report.title: UKSI taxon search children
report.description: Quick way of reviewing children involved in UKSI changes.
report.query: select #columns# from taxa_taxon_lists ttl join taxa t on t.id=ttl.taxon_id and t.deleted=false join taxa_taxon_lists ttlc on ttlc.parent_id=ttl.id AND ttlc.deleted=false and ttlc.taxon_list_id=#param_taxon_list_id# join taxa tc on tc.id=ttlc.taxon_id and tc.deleted=false join taxon_ranks trc on trc.id=tc.taxon_rank_id where ttl.taxon_list_id=#param_taxon_list_id# and ttl.deleted=false and t.organism_key='#param_organism_key#'

column.name: name_class
column.sql: case when trc.sort_order >= 300 and tc.language_id=2 then 'name-italic' else '' end
